Title: HBO's 'Harry Potter' TV show announced the young actors playing Harry, Ron, and Hermione. Here's everything we know about the upcoming series
Body:
Daniel Radcliffe as Harry Potter in "Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2."
Warner Bros.
A scripted "Harry Potter" TV show is in the works and eyeing a release on HBO Max in 2026.
The main trio will be played by newcomers Dominic McLaughlin, Alastair Stout, and Arabella Stanton.
